name: try
title: Try
description: Manage ephemeral workspace directories for experiments. A Raycast port of tobi/try.
author: wuyuxiangX

commands.name: browse
commands.title: Browse Try Directories
commands.subtitle: Try
commands.description: Browse and manage your try directories

preferences.name: tryPath
preferences.title: Try Directory Path
preferences.description: Path to the try directories folder

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
